title: FS: T205 Ty Cobb Piedmont SGC 1 PRICE SLASH

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Ty Cobb Piedmont SGC 1 PRICE SLASH
posts.post_content:
For sale is a SGC 1 T205 Ty Cobb with a Piedmont back. The front looks way better than a 1, but the back has spots of paper loss on each corner. I accept check, paypal gift, and money order. PM me or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions. Thanks!

$Sold

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=167970&d=1416086724[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=167971&d=1416086738[/IMG]

Sorry about the scan. I don't know why they're different sizes.

Email sent.  PMs working yet?
Dave
